name: BlitzAlien
description:
Controls are described in the Game. Press 'Esc' key to pause and resume the game. Not in very distant future that we will be attacked by outer world rulers - ALIENS. At some point of time they will invade our Planet. Their Invasion will be inevitable but we can try to make our stand against them.

In this Top-down Shooter game, the player takes the control of a futuristic turret which have regenerative property to stop the aliens from destroying our planet. Our planet is calling out for fighters!  Will you take the opportunity?

So, grab your turret and "make your last stand"
